alert.note: Alert for Cortland; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN SENECA...NORTHERN SCHUYLER...EASTERN YATES...SOUTHERN CAYUGA...WESTERN CORTLAND... NORTHEASTERN STEUBEN AND TOMPKINS COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM EDT... At 507 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tyrone to Mecklenburg to Slaterville Springs. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ithaca, Cortland, Hector, Romulus, Cayuga Heights, Starkey, Lansing, Enfield, Homer, and Caroline. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 10 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central New York.

area.areaDesc: Cortland; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates
